title: ISic001553. I.Sicily inscription 001553
body:
1Ἰθιοκασία ἥρυ̣σα ἀγαθά

1ΙΘΙΟΚΑΣΙΑΗΡ.ΣΑΑΓΑΘΑ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text checked against photograph in Vento;
  • line.1: Gabrici: ΙΘΙΟΚΑΣΙΑ ΗΡΥΣΑ ΑΓΑΘΑ; Manni Piraino: Ἰθι[. .]ασία ἥρ[υ]σα ἀγαθά

translation

commentary

Photograph in Vento is excellent and it is possible to see traces of almost the entire text, as originally read by Gabrici.

bibliography

  • 50.0993 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 42.1845 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 04.0043 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000531
  • Kretschmer 1927 307 no.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002533
  • Gabrici 1929 55-56 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001976
  • Bisi 1970 101 no.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002148
  • Vento 2000 88-91 tav.53-55 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001525
